name: AppointmentType
title: appointmentType
description: Code system of concepts used in an appointment request to describe the kind of appointment.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the ARQ segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0277 (Appointment Type Codes)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

concept.display: A request to add a completed appointment, used to maintain records of completed appointments that did not appear in the schedule (e.g., STAT, walk-in, etc.)
concept.definition: A request to add a completed appointment, used to maintain records of completed appointments that did not appear in the schedule (e.g., STAT, walk-in, etc.)

concept.display: Routine schedule request type - default if not valued
concept.definition: Routine schedule request type - default if not valued

concept.display: A request for a tentative (e.g., “penciled in”) appointment
concept.definition: A request for a tentative (e.g., “penciled in”) appointment

concept.display: Routine schedule request type – default if not valued
concept.definition: Routine schedule request type – default if not valued

concept.display: A request to add a completed appointment, used to maintain records of completed appointments that did not appear in the schedule (e.g., STAT, walk-in, etc.)
